mapper.select: /* selectUserCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_EM_COMP TEC INNER JOIN T_EM_DEPT TED ON TEC.COMP_SEQ = TED.COMP_SEQ AND TEC.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TED.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP TEE ON TED.DEPT_SEQ = TEE.DEPT_SEQ AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = TEE.EMP_SEQ AND TEE.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP_MAPPING TEEM ON TEC.COMP_SEQ = TEEM.COMP_SEQ AND TED.DEPT_SEQ = TEEM.DEPT_SEQ AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = TEEM.EMP_SEQ AND TEEM.USE_YND = 'Y' INNER JOIN T_EM_EMP_ACCOUNT TEEA ON TEEM.EMP_SEQ = TEEA.EMP_SEQ AND TEEA.USE_YND = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND TEC.COMP_SEQ = #{user.userCompSeq} AND TED.DEPT_SEQ = #{user.userDeptSeq} AND TEE.EMP_SEQ = #{user.userSeq}

/* selectAuthorizedCalendarList */ SELECT IFNULL(TSC.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TYPE, '') AS calType, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TITLE, '') AS calTitle, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_CONTENT, '') AS calContent, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_COLOR, '') AS calColor, 'Y' AS calAuthorized FROM T_SC_CAL TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ > 0 AND EXISTS( SELECT TSCU.CAL_SEQ FROM T_SC_CAL_USER TSCU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ = TSCU.CAL_SEQ AND (TSCU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userCompSeq} AND TSCU.CDE_TYPE = 'C' OR TSCU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userDeptSeq} AND TSCU.CDE_TYPE = 'D' OR TSCU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userSeq} AND TSCU.CDE_TYPE = 'I') AND TSCU.USE_YND = 'Y' ) AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'

/* selectUnAuthorizedCalendarList */ SELECT IFNULL(TSC.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TYPE, '') AS calType, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_TITLE, '') AS calTitle, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_CONTENT, '') AS calContent, IFNULL(TSC.CAL_COLOR, '') AS calColor, 'N' AS calAuthorized FROM T_SC_CAL TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ > 0 AND EXISTS( (SELECT TSSU.CAL_SEQ FROM T_SC_SCH TSS INNER JOIN T_SC_SCH_USER TSSU ON TSS.SCHM_SEQ = TSSU.SCHM_SEQ AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = TSSU.SCH_SEQ AND (TSSU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userCompSeq} AND TSSU.CDE_TYPE = 'C' OR TSSU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userDeptSeq} AND TSSU.CDE_TYPE = 'D' OR TSSU.CDE_SEQ = #{user.userSeq} AND TSSU.CDE_TYPE = 'I') WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ = TSSU.CAL_SEQ AND TSS.SCHM_SEQ > 0 AND TSS.SCH_SEQ > 0 AND TSS.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSSU.USE_YND = 'Y') ) AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSC.CAL_SEQ NOT IN #{authorizedCalendar}
